column1: Visitation will be Friday morning from 9:00 a.m. to 10:00 a.m. at Thompson Funeral Home.  Funeral services will be Friday morning at 10:00 a.m. in the chapel of Thompson Funeral Home in Trumann with Rev. Leon Minick and Rev. Jim Morgan officiating. Burial will follow in Jonesboro Memorial Park Cemetery in Jonesboro
